sentences.english: There is a variety of reservoir types in the north slope of Chenjiazhuang Uplift.
sentences.chinese: 陈家庄凸起北坡发育了多种类型的储集体。

sentences.english: The team climbed the north face of the mountain.
The northern flank of the mountain collapsed, producing the largest landslide in recorded history.
sentences.chinese: 山峰的北坡坍塌了，这是美国史上最大规模的山崩。

sentences.english: We climbed the north face of the mountain.
Grapes on the south slopes, olives on the north.
sentences.chinese: 南坡上种着葡萄，北坡是种橄榄。

sentences.english: Exit from the White Dagoba from the north side and descend the northern slope of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 从白塔北面的出口出来，顺着山从北坡下来。

sentences.english: Relatively, the factors of summer habitat selection in south slope are more than North slope.
sentences.chinese: 相比而言，秦岭南坡夏季栖居地选择因素多于北坡。

sentences.english: The ascent of the mountain was not difficult.
sentences.chinese: 这座山的北坡几乎是垂直的。

sentences.english: Sunlight from the south leaves north-facing slopes in shadow.
sentences.chinese: 南面照射而来的阳光让山体北坡被阴影覆盖。

sentences.english: In 1960 Chinese mountaineering team successfully completed it.
sentences.chinese: 1960年，中国登山队首次从北坡登上顶峰。

sentences.english: The setting sun strikes the Grand Canyon's North Rim.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳照在大峡谷的北坡上。

sentences.english: The northern side of the mountain is almost vertical.
sentences.chinese: 这座山的北坡几乎是垂直的。

sentences.english: Perfect for glacier treks through to steep north walls.
sentences.chinese: 这款冰爪十分适合用于冰川行走和北坡攀登。

definition: northern mountain/refers to Mt Mang 邙山 at Luoyang in Henan
abbr. for 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰, Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
Jade Emperor Peak on Mt Tai in Shandong
